title: Random words banned in client
body: Recently I have found words which have been banned in client (and possibly on boards too). Examples of which include .com endings on websites, parade, and sass. Seriously?

replies.body: I have, however I was trying to use Sass in a club name which wasn't allowed, and not everybody has turned their language filters off which is how I found out about the other two
A judge ruled here that you're not allowed to be offended by the word fuck because it is iconic australian slang XD
Try to post (((Green Frog))) without being cucked.
